item.title: OpenTelemetry Basics
item.description: +++ [twitter] card = “summary” site = “@twittername” title = “Special Title for the Card” description = “Special Description for the card max. 200 characters” image = “https://example.com/great-picture.jpg" +++ OpenTelemetry Basics I got to work on integrating OpenTelemetry in an application that our team maintains recently so I’m starting a series documenting my learnings throughout this journey. A little background info on the application I’m working on: it’s a Slack chatbot written in Typescript using BoltJS.
